alert.note: Alert for South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 17 at 2:26AM MST until January 18 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 7 inches possible. * WHERE...In Nebraska, Southern Sioux County. In Wyoming, South Laramie Range and South Laramie Range Foothills. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There is still uncertainty in the track of this storm which could impact where heavier snowfall occurs.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
